'''Searing Blast''' is an [[Character Card Elemental Burst|Elemental Burst]] for [[Emperor of Fire and Iron (Character Card)|Emperor of Fire and Iron]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

This skill is executed automatically 1 turn after using [[Battle-Line Detonation]].
